FOUND IN: Bebop artist (as bebop was a defining feature of the era)
Maori (the indigenous Polynesian people of New Zealand, or sometimes to refer to things related to them like language and culture)
Goiter (an unrelated term that may indirectly result from nutritional deficiencies but not a direct symptom of hunger itself)
Vestibule (part of the inner ear structure related to hearing and balance)
Trickle glen (not an established term, but evokes the imagery of narrow valleys with streams)
